definition[0]: happening, expected, or needed during a particular season
example[1]: seasonal jobs in the tourist industry
definition[1]: adjustments you make or changes that happen because of the situation during a particular period of the year, that is not typical of the rest of the year
example[2]: Unemployment figures were down during the summer months, even after seasonal adjustment.
definition[2]: happening or needed only at a particular time of year
example[3]: Thousands of agricultural laborers arrive to do seasonal work on American farms.
